"Flumptuousness" - The quality of being soft, fluffy, and cozy, often referring to a comfortable or inviting environment.
"Reloyalty" - The loyalty and commitment one has towards a brand, product, or service, beyond just customer satisfaction.
"Nulgence" - The feeling of indulgence or pleasure one experiences when doing something that is considered self-care or self-love, such as taking a relaxing bath or treating oneself to a spa day.
"Mindfulness" - The practice of being present and fully engaged in the moment, often achieved through meditation or other mindfulness techniques.
"Solace" - The comfort and peace one experiences in the presence of nature, often achieved through spending time in natural surroundings or engaging in outdoor activities.
